= Troubleshooting =
'''Boot / Startup ''' {| [[File:System.png|left]] | * [[Restore the GRUB Bootloader|Restore the GRUB Bootloader]] : ''Can't boot Manjaro? You may be able to repair rather than reinstall! '' * [[pacman_troubleshooting#"Configuration_file...not recognized" Error|Installation: "Configuration file...not recognized" Error]] : ''An explanation and solution for a problem encountered by some newcomers.
